subject: United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: While Tiger Woods faltered on a blustery day, Colin Montgomerie of Scotland grabbed the first-round lead by shooting a one-under 69 at the U.S. Open.
snippet: While Tiger Woods faltered on a blustery day, Colin Montgomerie of Scotland grabbed the first-round lead by shooting a one-under 69 at the U.S. Open.
